Question.txt: Good day, what brings you in here, stranger?
Question.reply: I'd like to buy some furniture, please.
I've just come in for a chat.

Conversation.Response: Sure, have a look through my catalogue!

Question.reply: Have you heard of the yeknom tribe?

Conversation.Response: Don't get me started on that lot! Coconut palm frond loving monkey people. To the battle, I say!
I've lived and worked here and rebuilt this place since the grand eruption 24 years ago. I've never looked back.
Conversation.PurchaseResponse: Thank you for your time. Enjoy your new furniture.
